#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<assert.h>
int main()
{
    int t,test;
    long long int num;
    long long int rem;
    long long int*dict=NULL;
    long long int maxsize=99999999;
    dict=(long long int*)calloc(sizeof(long long int), maxsize);
    if(dict)
    {
        scanf("%d", &test);
        assert(test>=1 && test<=1000);
        for(t=0;t<test;t++)
        {
            scanf("%lld", &num);
            assert(num>=1 && num<=1000000000);
            rem=num%1007;
            if(dict[rem-1]==0)
            {
                dict[rem-1]=dict[rem-1]+1;
                printf("%lld\n", rem);
            }
        }
    }
    getchar();
    return 0;
}
